TextLibrary.Text: Princess Serephine
You look worried, Princess. Is something wrong?
You look worried, Princess. Is something wrong?
You look worried, Princess. Is something wrong?
You look worried, Princess. Is something wrong?
I have just received a message from a friend of mine in Enmouth. I don't know how she found me here, but she says that she is in trouble and needs my help.
I have just received a message from a friend of mine in Enmouth. I don't know how she found me here, but she says that she is in trouble and needs my help.

I have just received a message from a friend of mine in Enmouth. I don't know how she found me here, but she says that she is in trouble and needs my help.
Do you trust this friend?
Do you trust this friend?
Do you trust this friend?
Do you trust this friend?

I have known her since we were girls. She says that she is in trouble with my father, and it is a matter of life or death. I'm not even certain that I could help her, but someone as brave as you might be able to do something.

I have known her since we were girls. She says that she is in trouble with my father, and it is a matter of life or death. I'm not even certain that I could help her, but someone as brave as you might be able to do something.

I have known her since we were girls. She says that she is in trouble with my father, and it is a matter of life or death. I'm not even certain that I could help her, but someone as brave as you might be able to do something.
Do you ever stop manipulating people, Serephine? We'll go and help your friend - there's no need to butter me up.

Oh, thank you. You ARE my hero, you know.
Oh, thank you. You ARE my hero, you know.
Oh, thank you. You're like the older sister I never had - always looking out for me.
Oh, thank you. You're like the older sister I never had - always looking out for me.
Yeah. Sure. As long as I'm doing what you want me to do.
Yeah. Sure. As long as I'm doing what you want me to do.
